titleStmt.title: A salutation to the little flock, who do chuse [sic] Christ to be their rock lift up your heads in the light of Christ, for the day of your redemption draws near : with a message from the Lord alone, for the healing of the sick and wounded one, and an exhortation unto all to give up unto the death, that they may be crowned with life / by John Samm.
titleStmt.author: Samm, John, d. 1664.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
